Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
cryptanalysis
The branch of {cryptography} concerned with decoding encrypted messages when you're not supposed to be able to.
(1994-12-06)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
cryptanalysis \crypt"a*nal"y*sis\, n. 1. the science which studies methods to discovering the secret meaning of encrypted messages for which one does not possess the secret decoding information (called the {key}). [PJC]
2. the methods and procedures used to discover the secret meaning hidden in encrypted messages. [PJC]
cryptanalysis n : the science of analyzing and deciphering codes and ciphers and cryptograms [syn: {cryptanalytics}, {cryptography}, {cryptology}]
